alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, southeastern Albany, northeastern Greene and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Baltimore, or 9 miles southwest of Nassau, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nassau, New Baltimore, Ravena, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Kinderhook, West Sand Lake, Coeymans, Stuyvesant, East Nassau, East Schodack, Stuyvesant Falls, Brookview, Chatham Center, Van Hoesen Station, Jacks Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge and Otter Hook. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 near exit 21A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for east central New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer
